actions.text: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Westerman.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Westerman amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to instruct the Department of Agriculture and the Department of Interior to provide Congress a yearly report tabulating the metrics surrounding wildfire prevention, including the number of acres treated and agency response time.
purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to instruct the Department of Agriculture and the Department of Interior to provide Congress a yearly report tabulating the metrics surrounding wildfire prevention, including the number of acres treated and agency response time.
